articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Belarus Olympic Games sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya takes refuge in Polish embassy - ABC News
articles.description: Krystsina Tsimanouskaya has a Polish humanitarian visa and plans to leave for the European country in coming days, according to a Polish government minister.
articles.content:
A Belarusian athlete who took refuge in the Polish embassy in Tokyo on Monday has been granted a humanitarian visa by the Warsaw government.
